messages:
WORDFORM has even-syllabic stem WORDFORM has uneven-syllabic stem WORDFORM has contract stem WORDFORM gets –včči- and is then inflected as even-syllabic stem. WORDFORM gets –včče. WORDFORM gets –ž- and is then inflected as uneven-syllabic stem. Weak grade. WORDFORM gets –eažža- and is then inflected as even-syllabic stem. WORDFORM gets the suffix –eš. WORDFORM gets –š- and is then inflected as uneven-syllabic stem. Weak grade. WORDFORM gets the suffix –še. Weak grade. WORDFORM has uneven-syllabic stem and no consonant gradation. WORDFORM has contract stem and no consonant gradation. WORDFORM shall be in nominative singular. WORDFORM shall be in nominative plural. WORDFORM shall be in accusative singular. WORDFORM shall be in accusative plural. WORDFORM shall be in genitive singular. WORDFORM shall be in genitive plural. WORDFORM shall be in illativ singular. WORDFORM shall be in illativ plural. WORDFORM shall be in locative singular. WORDFORM shall be in locative plural. WORDFORM shall be in comitative singular. WORDFORM shall be in comitative plural. WORDFORM shall be in essive.
Extra strong grade. without consonant gradation. without visible consonant gradation. and shall have strong grade. and shall have weak grade.
Diphthong simplification in the penultimate syllable. Remember diphthong simplification. Remember diphthong simplification and a > i. The attributive form is identical to the predicative form.
–it is deleted. -as is deleted. Vowel change u > o. t > g + a. t > g + at. t > hk + ii. is > á. oš > o. š > ž. s > ss + ii. ái > á. i > j. Vowel change a > i. Vowel change e > i. Vowel change e > á. Vowel change i > á. Vowel change o > u. Remember ái > i. Remember oš > u. š > šš + ii. Consonant change n > m. Consonant change t > g. Consonant change t > h. Consonant change t > d. Consonant change t > b. Consonant change h > t. Consonant change d > t. Remember i > e. Vowel change a > e. Vowel change a > á. Stem consonant: g. Stem consonant: n. Stem consonant: m. Consonant change š > čča. Consonant change š > žž + ii. Consonant change š > žž + i. Consonant change š > žž and -an-ending. Consonant change š > žž + a. Consonant change t > hk and -an-ending. -ss- and -an-ending. Consonant change š > šš and -an-ending. Consonant change š > čč and –as-ending. Consonant change š > čč and -ain-ending. Consonant change t > g and –as-ending. Consonant change t > g and –ain-ending. gets -a- and Gets even-syllabic stem, a > i, and Gets even-syllabic stem and + -mus and
